question:
Question: You are navigating to [Huaji Stone Rice Rolled Rice Roll]. Thinking back on past actions and objects seen, what is the surrounding environment like at your current location?  
Choice:  
A. There is a large park in front of me with a playground and fountain. There are several high-rise buildings on my left and right sides.  
B. There are shops and parking lots directly in front of me. There are several high-rise residential buildings to my left and behind me. There is a busy road running parallel to the parking lot with many vehicles.  
C. I am located above a broad avenue with dense traffic. Directly behind me is a large shopping mall with a small park to my left.  
D. There is a wide open space in front of me. A row of low-rise buildings is visible to my left, followed by tall buildings.  
E. I am located over a quiet residential area surrounded by low-rise buildings. There is a small market on my right.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The surrounding environment includes shops and parking lots directly in front, with several high-rise residential buildings to the left and behind. There is also a busy road running parallel to the parking lot with many vehicles, which matches the description in option B.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 15), (17, 35), (1:43, 1:58)]
Option: B
Reason: The video shows shops and parking lots directly in front of the agent's location. There are several high-rise residential buildings to the left and behind the agent. A busy road runs parallel to the parking lot with many vehicles. This matches the description in option B.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The surrounding environment includes shops and parking lots directly in front, with several high-rise residential buildings to the left and behind. There is also a busy road running parallel to the parking lot with many vehicles, which matches the description in option B.
